extends java.lang.Object

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CACHE_TYPE

public static final java.lang.String CACHE_TYPE
Type of cache to use. Possible values: auto|none|mru|soft * Default auto.

With auto soft cache is used if VM have more then 1000 MB available. Bellow that mru cache is used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CACHE_SIZE

public static final java.lang.String CACHE_SIZE
Cache size (when applicable)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

COMPRESS

public static final java.lang.String COMPRESS
Compress pages in RecordManager with ZLIB. This may result in better space usage, but lower performance. Possible values: true|false (default false)

See Also:
Constant Field Values
